guides.guideContent:
Step 1 Log in your DOBA backend >> click “Stores” tab>> click "Connect a New Store" button >> click WiX logo

Step 2 Type in your eBay store name & click Connect

Step 3 Select the wix store you want to connect with DOBA >> Click “add to site” >> Click "Connect Store" to Confirm the Connection.

Step 4 After successful authorization, the page will go back to DOBA

Step 1 Login to your WooCommerce store and click on WooCommerce on the left hand side & select Settings in the drop down menu

Step 2 Click on the Advanced tab & then click REST API & select Add Key

Step 3 In the Description box, you will fill in a name you would like to use & under Permissions open the drop down menu & select Read/Write - Then press Generate API Key and you will have“Consumer Key” & “Consumer Secret” & “QR code”

Step 4 Log in your DOBA backend >> click “Stores” tab>> click "Connect a New Store" button >> click woocommerce logo

Step 5 enter in your Store URL, Consumer Key & Consumer Secret then press Connect >> connect your Woocommerce store successfully

Step 1 Log in your Bigcommerce store > click “Advanced Settings” > click “API Account”

Step 2 Click “ Create API Account” > click “Creat V2/V3 API Token”

Step 3 Fill in your Name > Information & Settings clicking “read-only” / Orders clicking “modify” / Products clicking “modify” > click “Save” button in the bottom right > get your “BigCommerce API Credentials” & download txt file

Step 4 Log in your DOBA backend >> click “Stores” tab>> click "Connect a New Store" button >> click Bigcommerce logo

Step 5 Copy & paste info of “BigCommerce API Credentials” & API Path in the download txt file to the blank columns > click connect > connect your Bigcommerce store successfully

Step 1 Go to your Newegg backend >> Seller Portal > Manage Account > Data Feed Settings > API Settings >> Click REQUEST to get started then enter your contact information.

Step 2 Enable/Disable API access. The current account status of API access. For any questions or concerns, please contact Newegg Integration team

Step 3 Assign a secret key for the service provider, click AUTHORIZE then select service provider from the list. Click AUTHORIZE to complete and generate a secret key.

 (Noteï¼šIf the service provider is not on the list, please contact Newegg Integration)

Step 4 Log in your DOBA backend >> click “Stores” tab>> click "Connect a New Store" button >> click newegg logo >> fill in your store name, Seller ID and Secret key then click Confirm to complete the authorization.

Step 1 Log in your DOBA backend >> click “Stores” tab>> click "Connect a New Store" button >> click eBay logo

Step 2 Type in your eBay store name & click Connect

Step 3 Once you press the Connect button, you will be redirected to eBay and it will prompt you to login to your eBay store >> Once you have read through the agreement, press I agree

Before you start your dropshipping business, you need connect your Shopify store to DOBA. After your Shopify store connected, you could easily list your products & place your orders.

Step 1 Log in your DOBA backend >> click “Stores” tab>> click "Connect a New Store" button >> click Shopify logo

Step 2 Enter your shopify domain in the blank box & click "Connect" button

Step3 You will then be redirected to Shopify and it will prompt you to login. Once you get logged in, a warning screen will show up asking if you would like to install DOBA, you will click “Install Unlisted App”

After you have selected Install Unlisted App, you be redirected back to Doba and indicate you authorized successfully >> view your Shopify store under the store list with the status of "Activated" and "Valid".

Before you use Doba to manage your Amazon store, we need to get your account authorization. Please find the following instructions on how to authorize your Amazon account to Doba:

Click 'Connect a New Store' in Doba, choose Amazon, then it goes to the Doba App page in Amazon App Store.


Click 'Authorize Now' in Doba App page


Agree Doba's access then click 'Login to Doba - Dropshipping now'.


Login to Doba and fill in the store name to complete connection.

According to Amazon's requirements, your authorization needs to be renewed once a year, please follow Amazon's notification email. For more details"https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api-news/docs/april-2022 "

1.) You had better to choose “update each time inventory changes” and “set store sku inventory to zero” to manage the inventory information of the products you listed to your store.

2.) You had better to choose “All Store Orders” as in this way you can also find the items which you forgot to add the connection >> Click “Upload automatically”, then the tracking number will sync to your store front automatically >> Set your minimum expected profit margin >> You can edit your billing address here

3.) If you click “Compare at Price”, a comparison price will be displayed in your store and the system will multiply the original price by twice plus the shipping cost as the compare at price. You can also adjust it by yourself. >> you had better to click “Shipping”, the system will automatically add shipping cost for you when setting the sales price. >> If you click “sale price”, this is the retail price of the product you sold in the store. The default retail price is 20% profit plus shipping. You can also adjust it yourself.

4.) If you connected your Amazon store with Doba, you can set “Fulfillment Latency” in the Doba back-end.
Click "Remove" in the drop-down box of "More Action" to Remove the store
